response.summary:
Three years of working experience in electrical design and commissioning of power distribution, control, communication, and lighting systems in commercial, institutional, and public sectors in Latin America.

Bachelor´s degree in electrical engineering 
Proactive and self motivated, with excellent interpersonal skills and resilience under pressure. Detail-oriented with keen observation skills.
 Proficient in AutoCAd, REVIT, dialux and MS Office.
response.skills: Seguimiento de proyectos, Liderazgo, Servicio de atención al cliente, Ingeniería de proyectos, Cumplimiento de la normativa, Inglés, AutoCAD, dialux, Microsoft PowerPoint, Trabajo en equipo, Revit, Iluminación, Diseño eléctrico, Subestación, Ingeniería eléctrica, Bases de datos

profile_positions.description:
•	Ensure electrical design drawings are produced with accuracy and accordance with applicable codes and standards.
•	Perform design and technical calculations, construction details, cable routing diagrams and panel layouts for the new public trains transport systems in Bogota.
profile_positions.title: Electrical support engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Interface with installation personnel to communicate requirements and to assist with installations/construction issues
•	Use autoCAD and REVIT to create and design electrical drawings for commercial and residential buildings perform changes and revisions as required
•	Generate material requisitions (wiring, panel, conduit, etc) for project execution
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Create installations drawings for commissioning of public medium voltage systems for Colombia National utility company, Codensa
•	Create as-built single-line and wiring diagrams for municipal public lighting network
profile_positions.title: Project Technologist

profile_positions.description:
•	Review of technical documents (such as electrical drawings and design calculations) verify compliance with national standards and codes for various commercial, residential and industrial projects (manufacturing facilities, Oil)
•	Detailed review of electrical drawing and design calculations
•	Create engineering reports and interface with clients to communicate finding and recommendations.
profile_positions.title: Document control

profile_positions.description:
•	Produce As-build building electrical wiring diagrams
•	Prepare, review and redraft electric design drawings alongside the engineering team.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Assistant

company.name: WSP en Colombia
company.description:
Empresa líder en servicios de consultoría de proyectos de recursos hídricos, ingeniería, medioambiente y sustentabilidad en América Latina y el mundo. Hoy contamos con más de 68.000 expertos en más de 50 países. 

Somos expertos técnicos, consultores estratégicos, ingenieros, arquitectos, gerentes, topógrafos y especialistas ambientales, así como profesionales en diseño, gerencia de proyectos y construcción. Diseñamos soluciones duraderas en Edificaciones, Transporte, Ambiente, Agua y Saneamiento Básico, Industria y Energía (incluyendo Minería e Hidrocarburos) así como entrega de proyectos y servicios de consultoría estratégica.
